articles.author: Sarah Rumpf-Whitten
articles.title: 'Googlers against genocide' lead sit-ins, protests coast-to-coast at tech giant's offices - Fox Business
articles.description: A group of Google employees staged sit-ins at three of the tech giant's offices to protest the company's work with the Israeli government.
articles.content:
Google workers led sit-ins at headquarters from coast-to-coast, protesting the tech giant's contract with the Israeli military and the company's alleged complicity in the Israel-Hamas war.
Tech work… [+2855 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: NASA says it needs better ideas on how to return samples from Mars - Ars Technica
articles.description: The Jet Propulsion Laboratory is losing its grip on managing NASA's next flagship mission.
articles.content: Enlarge/ NASA's existing plan for Mars Sample Return involves a large lander the size of a two-car garage, two helicopters, a two-stage bespoke rocket, a European-built Earth return vehicle, and the … [+4307 chars]
